name: Audio Visualizer and Music Player
description:
Audio visualizer that syncs with music.

  • Play your own music! (.wav or .ogg)
  • Or listen to built in songs by Corter Lee!
  • Choose between three background themes!

Music Hotkeys:

  • K or Space to pause/play
  • J and L to jump forward or back 10 seconds
  • N and B to go to (N)ext song or go (B)ack a song

Camera Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move around
  • Q and E to zoom in and out
  • R to reset camera
